participant_abstract.sent: We began with presentations from the marketing and user interface designer, who told us about the needs and desire of our hip young consumer market.
Next, I gave my spiel about industrial design and whatnot, making sure to inject some sarcasm and humor along with the presentation.
Ultimately, we voted and came to a consensus that our product should have a sleek exterior design -- "organic" as Helen called it -- and a novel feature: automatic speech recognition.
This feature would not only reduce the clutter of buttons, but would allow a user to find a lost remote, or even to continue using a remote control that was lost, but within range.

participant_decisions.sent: Decided what was practical and within budget.
Chose the speech recognition feature over the display screen.

participant_problems.sent: We will need to address the issue of background noise produced by the television set.
I have an idea in mind that incorporates a second microphone placed next to the television speaker, allowing subtractive cancellation of the television's signal.
